act_info.full_title: Succession Duty Legislation Repeal Act, 2009, S.O. 2009, c. 34, Sched. T

content.content: 1 (1) The Succession Duty Act, being chapter 449 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970, is repealed to the extent it continues to be in force under section 1 of The Succession Duty Repeal Act, 1979 and applies in respect of a person who died before April 11, 1979.  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 1 (1). The Succession Duty Act Supplementary Provisions Act, 1980 (2) The Succession Duty Act Supplementary Provisions Act, 1980 is repealed.  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 1 (2). 2-5 Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, ss. 2-5. 6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 6. 7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 7. ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
1 (1) The Succession Duty Act, being chapter 449 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970, is repealed to the extent it continues to be in force under section 1 of The Succession Duty Repeal Act, 1979 and applies in respect of a person who died before April 11, 1979.  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 1 (1).

The Succession Duty Act Supplementary Provisions Act, 1980

(2) The Succession Duty Act Supplementary Provisions Act, 1980 is repealed.  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 1 (2).

2-5 Omitted (amends, repeals or revokes other legislation).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, ss. 2-5.

6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 6.

7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).  2009, c. 34, Sched. T, s. 7.

______________

 

Français
